Title: Endless Quizzes
Description:
Endless quizzes will be an application that allows anyone to create their own quiz and to play others, with high score & popularity rankings.

It will be programmed in C# as a Silverlight application with a db4o database, using healthy SOLID principles.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Endless quizzes will be an application that allows anyone to create their own quiz and to play others, with high score & popularity rankings.

It will be programmed in C# as a Silverlight application with a db4o database, using healthy SOLID principles.
